name: Trash Santa
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Summary

Compete with your friend online to be the one to collect the most gift dispersed all across the Elf village

 Controls

- Movement -> Z/Q/S/D

- Space -> Jump

- Mouse -> Rotate camera

 Disclaimer

- This game was just made for a school project and is not intended to be updated or continued

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Julien MACHADO - Developeur réseau / gameplay
